name: Eden
tagline: Android Mobile Application for Eve Online
body:
### Eden for Eve Online

Eden is a character monitoring application for Android devices.  You may download the current release from the [play store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zdonnell.eve), or build it yourself via source.

### Libraries
Eden makes use of the following libraries:
* [SlidingMenu](https://github.com/jfeinstein10/SlidingMenu)
* [Picasso](http://square.github.io/picasso/)
* [ActionBarSherlock](https://github.com/JakeWharton/ActionBarSherlock)
* [eveapi](https://code.google.com/p/eveapi/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
